prompt_template:
### Instructions
You will receive two documents: "Document 1" and "Document 2". Your task is to analyze the content of both and determine the nature of the relationship between them.

### Response Options
Explicit Reference: "Document 2" explicitly cites the same specific events covered in "Document 1", either through direct quotations or clear paraphrases.
No Reference: "Document 2" makes no reference whatsoever to the specific events addressed in "Document 1".

### Output Format
response: [Explicit Reference/No Reference]
excerpts that confirm the response: [Relevant excerpts from both documents that support your answer]

### Document 1 (published on {date_of_statement})
{financial_statement}

### Document 2 (published on {date_of_report})
{report}
